div.p: Description:A code specifying the meaning and purpose of every TransmissionRelationship instance. Each of its values implies specific constraints to what kinds of Transmission objects can be related and in which way.

description.value: Description: A code specifying the meaning and purpose of every TransmissionRelationship instance. Each of its values implies specific constraints to what kinds of Transmission objects can be related and in which way.

definition.value: Description: A transmission relationship indicating that the source transmission follows the target transmission.
